"review": "The SmartCool air conditioner is a real game-changer with its ultra-efficient cooling capabilities, but the installation process was quite complicated and required professional assistance. "product_name": "SmartCool Ultra Fridge",

"review": "The SmartCool Ultra Fridge has some impressive features, like the built-in touchscreen and voice-controlled temperature settings. However, the fridge seems to have trouble maintaining a consistent temperature, causing food to spoil faster than expected. The ice maker also frequently gets clogged, which is frustrating. Despite these issues, it's still a stylish and high-tech addition to any kitchen."
